name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notion Data Extractor by Table Capture

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to extract data from Notion tables to Excel (XLSX), CSV or the clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to extract data from Notion tables to Excel (XLSX) & CSV or copy that data to your clipboard!

Last updated: December 2024

Features:
• Export to Microsoft Excel (XLSX), CSV
• Copy to Clipboard

How it works:
• Just right-click to download in your desired format
• You get 5 free exports, afterwards you can purchase a 30-pack of exports or a license for unlimited exports.

♥,
George
